news.title: Dead Body Found in Impounded Car Registered to D4vd, Police Say
news.summary: A Tesla registered to the singer in Texas was impounded in California, where the body was discovered. D4vd has been on tour since early August.

news.title: Andrew Bird Announces The Mysterious Production of Eggs Anniversary Reissue
news.summary: The new edition of the 2005 album will include live recordings, alternate versions, and more

news.title: Lady Gaga Announces 2026 Mayhem Ball Tour Dates
news.summary: The newly announced North American concerts take place in February, March, and April

news.title: The Mountain Goats Announce New Album, Share New Song “Armies of the Lord”: Listen
news.summary: Lin-Manuel Miranda and the Replacements’ Tommy Stinson appear on Through This Fire Across From Peter Balkan

news.title: Tortoise Announce First Album in Nine Years, Share Video for New Song: Watch
news.summary: “Layered Presence” is the latest preview of Touch

news.title: Watch Lady Gaga Perform “Vanish Into You” on Colbert
news.summary: Gaga sang and played piano for the stripped-down rendition of the Mayhem song

news.title: Yasmin Williams Shares Statement on Decision to Perform at Trump-Led Kennedy Center
news.summary: In April, the composer and guitarist posted screenshots of a heated email exchange with Kennedy Center president Richard Grenell
